str=''
count = input()
while(count>0):
    candles = list(raw_input())[::2]
    candles.append(candles.pop(0))
    minimum = int(min(candles))
    index = candles.index(min(candles)) + 1
    if(index==10):str+="1"
    while(minimum >= 0):
        minimum-=1
        if(index==10):str+='0'
        else:str+=`index`
    str+='\n'
    count-=1
print str
